result.title: The report ‘Labour in the Transition to the CE'
result.description: This report task 13 will contain a review of specialised literature in Environmental Labour Studies an emerging field of investigation focussing on union politics visvis the climate crisis as well as by directly analysing the ITUC and ILO Just Transition documents with a view to single out current tendencies in tradeunion understandings of and proposals towards the CE This task will produce a focus report on Labour in the Transition to the CE

result.title: Global Atlas of CE practices
result.description: Drawing on the expertise of the SIRDC in geographical information system (GIS) and Remote Sensing technologies, task 1.4 will create a Global Atlas of CE practices and initiatives accessible that will run on a web service integrated with the website of the project. The Atlas will be updated during the entire duration of the project and will be online at least for 3 years after the end of the project. The platform will collect and visualise information about CE practices and initiatives aligned with the dimensions explored by JUST2CE. The Atlas will be populated with the contribution of all the consortium members.
